TopicTitle: If You Can Round Trip This (Then You Can One Way That) Sorted by Delta V Values

Articles.Content:
Values are from on http://i.imgur.com/NKZhU57.png and include maximum dV for inclination changes.

IfYouCanRoundTripThis (ThenYou,Can,OneWayHere)

IfYouCanRoundTripThisThenYouCanRoundTripAbove (AsWell,As,OneWay,Here)

If you can roundtrip Minmus (then you can go to the Mun)

Mun Roundtrip (Ike, Gilly, Duna)

Ike Roundtrip (Gilly, Duna)

Gilly Roundtrip (Duna, Pol, Dres, Vall, Jool Low Orbit, Eeloo)

Duna Roundtrip (Pol, Dres, Vall, Jool Low Orbit, Eeloo)

Pol Roundtrip (Dres, Vall, Jool Low Orbit, Eeloo, Tylo, Bop, Moho, Laythe)

Dres Roundtrip (Vall, Jool Low Orbit, Eeloo, Tylo, Bop, Moho, Laythe)

Vall Roundtrip (Jool Low Orbit, Eeloo, Tylo, Bop, Moho, Laythe)

Jool Low Orbit Roundtrip (Eeloo, Tylo, Bop, Moho, Laythe)

Eeloo Roundtrip (Tylo, Bop, Moho, Laythe)

Tylo Roundtrip (Bop, Moho, Laythe)

Moho Roundtrip (Laythe, Eve)

Laythe Roundtrip (Eve)

Eve Roundtrip (Low Kerbol Orbit)

Low Kerbol Orbit Roundtrip

DeltaV Values (Presenting both dV from Kerbin, and dV from Low Kerbin Orbit [70km])

The following values are given, the values from Kerbin are best for rocket builders, the values from Low Kerbin Orbit are best for SSTOs developers).

(OneWaydVFromKerbin)/(RoundTripdVFroMKerbin) Destination (OneWayFromLowKerbinOrbit/RoundTripFromLowKerbinOrbit)
